Posts.Content: Jan 5, 2013 08:22AM suegr8 wrote: Lots of protein, rest & water are great suggestions, Jubby.  Have you tucked a folded handtowel size item between your arm and torso at the elbow level?  This keeps pressure off your node incision area.  Some BC clinics send women home with heart shaped cushions to place there.  cheers
Posts.Title: very tired and spacey after surgery Jubby Jubby
